game.name: TS Marketplace: South London Network Scenario Pack 01
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Face tight timetables and adverse weather conditions, and perform everything from ordinary commutes to empty stock and depot manoeuvres! Step up to the challenge with Larias Games’ South London Network Scenario Pack 01!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Face tight timetables and adverse weather conditions, and perform everything from ordinary commutes to empty stock and depot manoeuvres! Step up to the challenge with Larias Games’ South London Network Scenario Pack 01!
